response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth and the value it can bring to you, I am offering it to you for $95. This price allows me to maintain a reasonable profit while ensuring you receive a high-quality item at a fair price. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 95}
